recommendations: Akanksha Choudhary ‚ÄúSwarnab is an incredibly passionate and driven entrepreneur, whose enthusiasm for helping small businesses succeed in the digital landscape is truly inspiring. His mission to empower each small business to grow and thrive online has left a lasting impression on me. Through his guidance and vision, I have already gained a wealth of knowledge in digital marketing and SEO, learning about strategies and techniques I had never encountered before. I look forward to continuing this journey with him and deepening my expertise, knowing there is much more to discover and accomplish in this ever-evolving field.‚Äù

Arindam Mukherjee ‚ÄúI had the privilege of working with Swarnab Das at Favfly, a dynamic digital marketing agency where he fosters a culture of innovation and growth. Swarnab gave me the opportunity to work with an amazing team, and his mentorship has been invaluable. He leads with vision and integrity, always encouraging his team to push boundaries and think creatively. Favfly, under his leadership, is a company that truly empowers its people. I'm grateful for the chance to learn from him and highly recommend Swarnab as both a leader and mentor.‚Äù
